name: DIA (DEMO)
description:
DIA is a horror and adventure game where you take place at the feet of Nico, which in a disastrous night gets into a dimension where his fears and biggest traumas take shape, but he is not alone, because he takes with him komi, his doll which took a more human form to help him and guide him on his way

This game is in development, you would help us a lot with a donation to our PayPal where you can give the amount you want, because you know, do these things with a laptop with a celeron processor is horrible

Controls:
Arrows  keys = Move
Shift = Run 
Cancel/Menu = X
Accept/Interact = Z

DISCLAIMER
English is not our main language, so there will be mistranslations
If you could  contact SM#9575 and let him know about (Bugs, Mistransaltions, Etc)
We would be very grateful

Whit love,isai rodríguez and SM.
